original_title: 60,000 MT of coal to arrive tomorrow
original_body_lines: A shipment with 60,000 metric tonnes of coal is scheduled to arrive in the country tomorrow, the chairman and managing director of Lanka Coal Company, Shehan Sumanasekara said.
He told the Daily Mirror that the program to bring coal to Sri Lanka to generate electricity without interruption until September is going on successfully. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
